pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculation of Low Flow Statistics for Daily Stream Flow Data // The "Manual on Low-flow Estimation and Prediction" (Gustard Demuth (2009, ISBN:978-92-63-11029-9)), published by the World Meteorological Organisation, gives a comprehensive summary on how to analyse stream flow data focusing on low-flows. This packages provides functions to compute the described statistics and produces plots similar to the ones in the manual.
